turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Where would you like your order to be placed?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like the order to be placed at 1378 W Wade Hampton Blvd, Greer, SC 29651

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which coffee would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like the Black & White Mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a medium.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which milk type would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 2% please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you have any special requests?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would also like caramel.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Is that all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Extra sugar too.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Do you have any additional requests?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that will be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to finalize your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your drink is on order at 1378 W Wade Hampton Blvd, Greer, SC 29651 and will be available for pick up shortly. Your receipt will be sent via text message. Thanks.
